intro: This release introduces new TTS services, configuration options, improved text processing, and some bug fixes.
notes: New online TTS services: SpanishDict, TTS-API.com
Support for the SVOX Pico engine software (Linux)
New option to playing only revealed cloze text in on-the-fly mode
User-configurable custom string replacements on input phrases
New options to customize the window shortcuts
Support for using modifier keys with on-the-fly shortcut keys
Fixed very long voice name detection in OS X Speech Synthesis
Fixed crash when unsetting on-the-fly shortcut keys
